text: Raja Ram Yadav (born 4 January 1957) is a retired professor of Physics worked at University of Allahabad and former vice-chancellor of Veer Bahadur Singh Purvanchal University. ==Education and career== Yadav did his B.Sc., M.Sc. and PhD from University of Allahabad in 1977, 1979 and 1988 respectively. He started his teaching career as a lecturer of Mahatma Gandhi Chitrakoot Gramoday Vishwavidyalaya in 1992. He joined University of Allahabad in 1996 as an associate professor and become a professor in 2004 there. In 2017 he was named as vice chancellor of Veer Bahadur Singh Purvanchal University, a post he served till 2020. ==References== ==External links== *Info * Module Category:Living people Category:Heads of universities and colleges in India Category:University of Allahabad alumni Category:Scientists from Uttar Pradesh Category:1957 births
